sourcesContent:
export const tutorials = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Welcome to Enigmad",
    content: "Learn how the historic Bombe machine helped crack codes during World War II.",
    steps: [
      "Study the encrypted message at the top of the screen",
      "Click dots on the plugboard to create a pattern",
      "Run the Bombe machine to test your pattern",
      "Use the decryption key to solve the message",
      "Type your solution in the boxes below"
    ],
    difficulty: "beginner"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: "Understanding Patterns",
    content: "The Bombe machine works by testing possible rotor settings based on patterns.",
    steps: [
      "Look for repeated letters in the encrypted text",
      "Create patterns that match these repetitions",
      "More complex patterns may require more dots",
      "Efficiency is key - use the minimum dots needed"
    ],
    difficulty: "intermediate"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: "Advanced Techniques",
    content: "Master the art of efficient pattern recognition.",
    steps: [
      "Analyze letter frequency in the encrypted text",
      "Consider common English words and patterns",
      "Use the minimum number of dots possible",
      "Speed and accuracy improve your score"
    ],
    difficulty: "advanced"
  }
];
